data.message: Abstract Art 10 Principles Framework: 1) Color Speaks (emotion without representation), 2) Negative Space (empty = active), 3) Process > Product (gesture matters), 4) Temperature (warm/cool tension), 5) Scale/Weight (size = importance), 6) Rhythm (repetition + variation), 7) Balance (asymmetrical equilibrium), 8) Direction (lines guide eye), 9) Depth (overlap creates layers), 10) Harmony/Discord (color relationships set mood). These principles translate directly to UI design.
